security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only design guidelines and instructions. No executable code, network calls, filesystem operations, or external commands. All 49 high-severity findings are false positives from pattern matching against instructional text.

content.user_title: Design distinctive frontend interfaces with bold aesthetics
content.value_statement: Generic AI outputs produce bland, derivative web designs that lack character. This skill guides Claude to commit to bold aesthetic directions and deliver production-grade, memorable frontend code with intentional creative choices.
actual_capabilities: Generate production-ready HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, or Vue components
Apply bold aesthetic directions including minimalist, maximalist, retro-futuristic, brutalist, and art deco styles
Create custom typography pairings with distinctive fonts that avoid generic choices
Implement CSS animations, micro-interactions, scroll-triggered effects, and hover states
Design spatial compositions with asymmetry, unexpected layouts, and grid-breaking elements
Build cohesive color themes using CSS variables for consistency
limitations: Does not access external design systems or component libraries directly
Cannot test generated code in live browsers or validate accessibility automatically
Relies on user-provided context for technical constraints and framework requirements

use_cases.title: Build striking UI components
use_cases.description: Create memorable buttons, cards, navigation bars, and page layouts that stand out from generic templates with bold aesthetics

use_cases.title: Implement creative designs
use_cases.description: Execute bold design visions with production-quality code, animations, and meticulous attention to visual details

use_cases.title: Design landing pages
use_cases.description: Build visually stunning landing pages with unique aesthetics, engaging interactions, and memorable visual experiences

prompt_templates.title: Basic component request
prompt_templates.scenario: User wants a simple UI component
prompt_templates.prompt: Design and build a navigation bar for a portfolio page. Choose a bold aesthetic direction and implement production-ready code with animations.

prompt_templates.title: Themed interface request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a hero section with a brutalist aesthetic. Include distinctive typography pairings, CSS custom properties for colors, and scroll-triggered animations.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive component
prompt_templates.prompt: Build an interactive pricing card grid with hover states, staggered reveal animations on page load, and micro-interactions. Use CSS-first approach for all animations.

prompt_templates.title: Full page design
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a complete landing page for a creative agency with asymmetric layout, unexpected spatial composition, atmospheric gradient backgrounds, and cohesive visual details. Include all HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code.

output_examples.input: Create a pricing card component for a SaaS product with a refined minimalist aesthetic
output: Three pricing tier cards with clean typography hierarchy using a distinctive serif-sans pairing
Dominant neutral background with single sharp accent color for call-to-action buttons
Subtle hover effects with smooth CSS transitions and micro-shadow changes
Responsive grid layout that stacks gracefully on mobile devices
CSS custom properties for colors, spacing, and typography to maintain visual consistency

output_examples.input: Build a hero section for a music festival website with a maximalist aesthetic
output: Bold display typography with overlapping text layers and decorative elements
Vibrant gradient mesh backgrounds with animated grain overlay texture
Scroll-triggered staggered reveal animations for lineup information
Asymmetric layout with diagonal flow and grid-breaking visual elements
Custom cursor design and dramatic drop shadows for depth

best_practices: Commit to a clear aesthetic direction before coding because minimalism or maximalism both work when executed with intentional precision
Choose distinctive typography pairings that elevate the design beyond generic system fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto
Use CSS custom properties and variables to maintain visual consistency across all components and enable easy theming
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto without intentional styling choices that match your aesthetic direction
Applying timid, evenly-distributed color palettes instead of committing to bold dominant colors with sharp accent choices
Creating predictable centered layouts without spatial composition, asymmetry, overlap, or grid-breaking elements

faq.question: What frontend frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill works with HTML/CSS/JS, React, Vue, and similar frameworks. Specify your preferred framework in the prompt for tailored output.

faq.question: Can I use this skill for mobile-responsive designs?
faq.answer: Yes. Include responsive requirements in your prompt and the generated code will include appropriate media queries and mobile breakpoints.

faq.question: Does this skill access external design systems or libraries?
faq.answer: No. The skill generates custom code from scratch but you can provide design system documentation for Claude to incorporate into the output.

faq.question: Is the generated code production-ready?
faq.answer: Yes. The code follows production practices including semantic HTML, accessibility considerations, organized CSS structure, and performance optimization.

faq.question: Can I request dark mode or theme switching implementations?
faq.answer: Yes. Specify dark mode or theme switching in your prompt and the generated code will include CSS variables and appropriate theme styling logic.

faq.question: How does this differ from standard AI code generation?
faq.answer: This skill prioritizes distinctive aesthetics, creative direction, and intentional design choices over generic template-based outputs that lack character.
